docs.text:
The PHP_browseSOS set of modules are designed to assist developers parse instances of the IOOS 52N SOS.


Installation




Download the compressed ZIP file and extract the content onto a folder on the server that can be accessed via HTTP/HTTPS; and


Edit the ogc_sos.config file to provide the proper SOS endpoint to use. Note that support for multiple SOS endpoint are already listed in the issue tracking.




Modules


The following are the preliminary list of modules developed.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  
SOS request
    | 
php module
                      | 
variable
          | 
description

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetCapabilities                                                                {no passing parameters required}

                     getCap_serviceProvider.php          $providerName         name of the provider
                                                         $providerSite         provider URL

                     getCap_serviceIndentification.php   $serviceTitle         official title of service endpoint
                                                         $serviceAbstract      site abstract
                                                         $serviceKeywords      list of keywords used by the site

                     getCap_observationOffering          $offerings[]          array of offerings (stations and 
                                                                                  observable parameters, and bounding 
                                                                                  variables (space and time)


DescribeSensor                                                                 the following modules will require valid
                                                                               procedure that cen be obtained via the 
                                                                               $offering[] array (column 2).

                     desSen_description.php              $procedureDesc        description of the procedure
                                                         $procedureKeywords    list of keywords for the procedure
                     desSen_contact.php                  $procedureContact[]   array with contact details (name, 
                                                                                address, phone, email, site)
                     desSen_procedure.php                $procedureBound       geographic bounding
                                                         $procedureTimeRange   temporal bounding
                                                         $procedureOutputs[]   list of observable parameters measured

GetObservation                                                                 the following modules will require valid
                                                                               procedure that cen be obtained via the 
                                                                               $offering[] array (column 2), valid
                                                                               time range of interest (columns 3 and 4)
                                                                               and property (Column 5). The property
                                                                               can also be obtained from $procedure[]

                     getObs_description.php              $observationDesc      description of the observation being 
                                                                               measured
                                                         $observationBound     geographic bounding
                                                         $observationTimeRange temporal bounding

                     getObs_values.php                   $observationValues[]  array of the results (time, phenomenon,
                                                                               value)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The following are the preliminary list of modules developed.  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   SOS request     |  php module                       |  variable           |  description 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetCapabilities                                                                {no passing parameters required}

                     getCap_serviceProvider.php          $providerName         name of the provider
                                                         $providerSite         provider URL

                     getCap_serviceIndentification.php   $serviceTitle         official title of service endpoint
                                                         $serviceAbstract      site abstract
                                                         $serviceKeywords      list of keywords used by the site

                     getCap_observationOffering          $offerings[]          array of offerings (stations and 
                                                                                  observable parameters, and bounding 
                                                                                  variables (space and time)


DescribeSensor                                                                 the following modules will require valid
                                                                               procedure that cen be obtained via the 
                                                                               $offering[] array (column 2).

                     desSen_description.php              $procedureDesc        description of the procedure
                                                         $procedureKeywords    list of keywords for the procedure
                     desSen_contact.php                  $procedureContact[]   array with contact details (name, 
                                                                                address, phone, email, site)
                     desSen_procedure.php                $procedureBound       geographic bounding
                                                         $procedureTimeRange   temporal bounding
                                                         $procedureOutputs[]   list of observable parameters measured

GetObservation                                                                 the following modules will require valid
                                                                               procedure that cen be obtained via the 
                                                                               $offering[] array (column 2), valid
                                                                               time range of interest (columns 3 and 4)
                                                                               and property (Column 5). The property
                                                                               can also be obtained from $procedure[]

                     getObs_description.php              $observationDesc      description of the observation being 
                                                                               measured
                                                         $observationBound     geographic bounding
                                                         $observationTimeRange temporal bounding

                     getObs_values.php                   $observationValues[]  array of the results (time, phenomenon,
                                                                               value)
